# dismiss()

**Instance Method**

Dismisses the input picker.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func dismiss()
```

## Managing presentation

- **isPresented**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the picker is currently visible.
- **present()**: Presents the input picker.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the picker is currently visible.
